## jx create docs

Creates the documentation files

### Synopsis


Creates the documentation markdown files

```
jx create docs
```

### Examples

```
  # Create the documentation files
  jx create docs
```

### Options

```
  -d, --dir string   the directory to generate the docs into (default ".")
```
